text: So how long do you think you will be doing this for Supra? Uploading VGM's, that is. I am astounded by how far you've come already, it's nothing short of a miracle, that's for sure. I hope you never stop, though as they say, all good things must come to and end. Anyways just wanted to say thanks for making me love Video Game Music even more than I already did, and also thanks for showing me how many more people there are out there like me. I thought I was the only one :)

text: And here's to another 100! Epic final boss﻿ theme against Mega Bowser thanks to great orchestral music we come to expect from the Galaxy franchise.
